original_text: Would they have enough if flocks and herds were slaughtered for them? Would they have enough if all the fish in the sea were caught for them?”
korean_text: 그들을 위하여 양 떼와 소 떼를 잡은들 족하오며 바다의 모든 고기를 모은들 족하오리이까

sentences.original_text: Would they have enough if flocks and herds were slaughtered for them?
sentences.korean_translation: 양과 소떼를 그들을 위해 잡아주면 그들이 충분히 가질 수 있을까요?

sentences.original_text: Would they have enough if all the fish in the sea were caught for them?
sentences.korean_translation: 바다의 모든 물고기를 그들을 위해 잡아주면 그들이 충분히 가질 수 있을까요?
